---
title: "Shots"
author: "Shelby Krenn"
output: html_document
---

```{r, echo = FALSE, warning = FALSE, message = FALSE}
library(readxl)
library(DataComputing)
shots <- read_excel("rough.xlsx")
shots$loc_f = factor(shots$loc, levels=c('LL','LC','LR','ML','MC','MR','HL','HC','HR'))
```

##BY PLAYER
```{r, fig.width = 8, fig.height = 7, echo = FALSE, warning = FALSE}
ggplot(data = shots, aes(x = type, fill = loc)) +
  geom_bar() +
  facet_wrap(~plr)
```

##LOCATION FREQUENCY
```{r, fig.width = 8, fig.height = 7, echo = FALSE, warning = FALSE}
ggplot(data = shots, aes(x = type, fill = type)) +
  geom_histogram(stat = "count") +
  facet_wrap(~loc_f)
```

##EXPRESSED AS MAP
```{r pressure, echo=FALSE, out.width = '75%'}
knitr::include_graphics("Screen Shot 2018-10-17 at 15.31.26.png")
```
